criteria.description: Validator checks presence once, proportional scaling, and unit consistency.
criteria.justification: Checks missing/extra by name and compares quantities to scaled truth, but does not enforce single occurrence or verify units.

criteria.description: Reward differentiates exact match, near match (5%), and penalties.
criteria.justification: Implements +1 for exact, +0.5 for <5% avg error, and -1 for format/missing/extra/large error.

criteria.description: Supports multiple unit types and documents scaling rules.
criteria.justification: Data includes weight (g), volume (ml), and count (pcs); scaling multiplies quantities, but documentation on unit handling is minimal and not unit-specific.

criteria.description: Metadata logs per-ingredient errors, total absolute error, and omission/extra flags.
criteria.justification: Logs average relative error and flags for missing/extra; lacks per-ingredient percentages and total absolute error.

criteria.description: Unit tests/fixtures for upscale, downscale, fractional servings.
criteria.justification: No tests or fixtures found for this environment.

notes: Environment is a good start: clear scaling and reward tiers. To reach full credit, add unit verification and duplicate detection in validation, log per-ingredient and total absolute errors, document unit-type scaling behavior, and include tests covering up/down/fractional scenarios.
